# Arachnids
Arachnids are an eight-legged species of sentient giant spider.
## Arachnid Physiology
Thanks to their additional arms and legs, Arachnids have two additional Pocket slots in their inventory. They suffocate 50% faster and recover from it 50% slower, and their Blue Blood can't be metabolised from Iron, being based on Copper instead.
## Diet
Arachnids share evolutionary roots with spiders, and so they cannot metabolize Theobromine or Allicin. Be careful when eating chocolate, onions, or garlic, and avoid coffee and tea! Despite their dietary restrictions, they can eat raw meat without any ill effects.
## Pincers
Arachnids' sharp legs and pincers cause them to deal [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage with their unarmed attacks.
## Sericulture
Arachnids can create Websilk at the cost of getting more hungry. They (and only they) can craft bundles of websilk into various items from clothing, shields, and medicine to entire walls and furniture.
